mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM ur u INNER JOIN cf_lk c ON (u.ur_id = c.ur_id) WHERE u.ur_id = #{loginId};
SELECT count(*) FROM ur u INNER JOIN cf_cmt c ON (u.ur_id = c.ur_id) WHERE u.ur_id = #{loginId};

select cl.cf_id, c.cf_nm, ci.ci_nm, substring_index(c.loc_addr, ' ', '1') as loc_si, substring_index(substring_index(loc_addr, ' ', '2'), ' ', -1) as loc_gu from cf_lk cl JOIN cf c ON cl.cf_id = c.cf_id left join cf_img ci on cl.cf_id = ci.cf_id where cl.ur_id = #{urId} group by c.cf_nm;

select cc.cm_id, cc.cf_id, ci.ci_nm, c.cf_nm, cc.w_date, cc.star, cc.cm_txt from cf_cmt cc join cf c on cc.cf_id = c.cf_id left join cf_img ci on cc.cf_id = ci.cf_id where cc.ur_id = #{loginId} group by cm_id order by cc.w_date desc;
